PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05052021-06-03,  ,  ,  ,  LAB,  TC,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code
PrecisRegulations amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA LABOUR CODE in order to (1) correct grammatical errors and discrepancies between the English and the French versions; (2) add clarity to regulatory provisions; (3) improve consistency or harmonize terms with other provisions within or among the Regulations; (4) repeal obsolete or unnecessary regulatory provisions; and (5) address stakeholder concerns.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0122 Publication Date: 2021-06-23
AttachmentsAttachment
